mapper.insert: INSERT INTO file(name, local_url, size, user_id, md5, suffix, create_time) VALUES(#{name}, #{localUrl}, #{size}, #{userId}, #{md5}, #{suffix}, #{createTime})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM fud.file WHERE file.id=#{param2} AND file.user_id=#{param1}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO download(create_time, user_id, file_id) VALUES (#{createTime}, #{userId}, #{fileId})
mapper.select: SELECT file.id, file.name, file.size, file.suffix, file.create_time createTime FROM fud.file
SELECT file.name, file.size, file.suffix, file.create_time createTime, file.download_times downloadTimes FROM fud.file ORDER BY download_times DESC LIMIT 0,5
SELECT file.name, file.create_time createTime FROM fud.file ORDER BY create_time LIMIT 0, 5
SELECT f.name, d.create_time FROM fud.file f, fud.download d WHERE d.file_id=f.id ORDER BY d.create_time LIMIT 0, 5
